item.title: French broadcaster Canal+ shares fall 22% in London listing after spinoff from Vivendi
item.description: Shares in French broadcaster Canal+ fell over 22% following their London stock market debut Monday.

item.title: S&P 500 rises as Wall Street gets ready for Fed meeting this week: Live updates
item.description: The S&P 500 rose slightly on Monday as investors awaited a key Federal Reserve meeting slated for this week.

item.title: Bitcoin rises to new record above $107,000 ahead of this week's Fed decision
item.description: Bitcoin rallied to a new all-time high Sunday evening as investors awaited the Federal Reserve's final interest rate decision of the year.

item.title: Softbank CEO and Trump announce $100 billion investment in U.S. by firm
item.description: The money will be deployed before the end of Trump's term.

item.title: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz loses confidence vote, clearing the way for February election
item.description: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Monday lost a confidence vote in the country's Bundestag, clearing the path for an early election in February.
